Extra.RollInputHelp: Enter the roll input for the extra.

FateCoreUnleashed.LastStaminaUsed: {actor} has used their last stamina. Take 1 stress from Stamina use!
FateCoreUnleashed.NoStamina: {actor} has no stamina. Stamina needs to be reset, a point reduced, and 1 stress taken.
FateCoreUnleashed.LastFatePointUsed: {actor} has used their last fate point.
FateCoreUnleashed.NoFatePoints: {actor} has no fate points! This roll modification is invalid.

AutomateFatePoints.Name: Automate Fate Points
AutomateFatePoints.Hint: If enabled, fate points will be automatically decremented on a reroll or increase of a roll.

EnableStamina.Name: Enable Stamina
EnableStamina.Hint: If enabled, characters will have stamina added to their character sheet which auto decrements on a magic roll.

EnableExtrasRolling.Name: Enable Extras Rolling
EnableExtrasRolling.Hint: If enabled, extras can be configured with a roll field, and characters will have a button to roll extras.
